law.text: Every health officer provided for by this chapter shall be a duly licensed physician and shall possess such other qualifications that are prescribed by the Cabinet for Health and Family Services.
law.history: Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 99, sec. 400, effective June 20, 2005. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 426, sec. 351, effective July 15, 1998. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. VI, sec. 71. -- Amended 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 153, sec. 6. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 2054a-10, 2054a-15, 2054a-21, 2055.
